response: Logs or it never happened! (Please use pastebin, del.dog, or similar)
If you want to add ads to the app, use the master branch.
You must know we do not provide any kind of help or support when doing so, as stated in the readme.
You are expected to have some development knowledge.
Please open an issue on GitHub.
Be sure to add details and screenshots or recordings if possible
Everything included in the dashboard will work normally.
